item.title: Thanks To Our Community
item.description:
mailpile thanks you

Our Wonderful Community of Supporters

Icelandophiles & Postmaster Generals


DuckDuckGo

GreenQloud

Commons Machinery

Eben Moglen of Freedom Box

1984 Hosting

FSData

WiThings

Bytemark Hosting

Cartmell Holdings

Permanent Sunset

Intermine

Cloudfleet

RoboFont

Express VPN

Technically DuckDuckGo didn't donate to our crowdfunding compaign, but they gave us $5,000 as part of their 2014 FOSS Donations which we were very honored to receive amongst the company of so many other cool projects.

Our 1,113 Awesome Supporters
